intro: Retro Sokoban-style puzzle with pixel art and 8-bit sound. A fun challenge for all players. 2-10 hours to complete!?
description:
This is a puzzle game with a nostalgic vibe where you control a robot.
Connect the power source to the light bulb using blocks to open the door!

<Recommended for you if you are:>
- A fan of retro games.
- Looking for a light mental workout.
- Someone who has heard of "Sokoban" but never tried it.
- Searching for a casual and affordable game.

You'll also love the "Aha!" moments that happen right when you're about to clear a stage!
Enjoy! ツ


<Streaming Guidelines>
You are free to post or stream screenshots and video of the entire game without prior permission. Contacting us is not necessary.
Monetization of videos featuring this game is also permitted without any restrictions.
However, extracting, posting, or distributing individual assets from the game (e.g., music, character icons, etc.) is prohibited.
